original_text: At sunset, the people brought to Jesus all who had various kinds of sickness, and laying his hands on each one, he healed them.
korean_text: 해 질 무렵에 사람들이 온갖 병자들을 데리고 나아오매 예수께서 일일이 그 위에 손을 얹으사 고치시니

sentences.original_text: all who had various kinds of sickness
and laying his hands on each one
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 사람 한 사람 위에 손을 얹으시니
